translations: 意大利面食，意大利面制品（pasta的复数）

sentences.sentence: Food Suggestion: Baked lasagna, rabbit casserole, duck, tomato based pastas.
sentences.translation: 食物搭配：宽面，兔肉砂锅，鸭肉，茄汁意面。

sentences.sentence: Any kind of pasta: Bolognese is good, or baked and/or stuffed pastas are good
sentences.translation: 任何一种意大利面：意大利番茄牛肉面很好吃，或是烘培、酿面食也很不错

sentences.sentence: I smiled and he got up and hugged me. He kissed the top of my head then sat down as the waiter brought our pastas.
sentences.translation: 我笑了他站了起来拥抱了我，吻了我的额头然后坐下，因为此时服务员给我们端来面食。
